concerns: arranging times your children spend with you
heading: Putting your children first
lede: The needs of your children should come first when you make child arrangements with the other parent.
lede_additional: Most children will feel more secure if they have regular contact with their parents, if itâ€™s safe to do so. If they understand the situation you should involve them in the decision-making.
summary_lede_additional: Most children will feel more secure if they have regular contact with their parents and know where to get extra support if they need it. If they understand the situation you should involve them in the decision-making.
